title: 2014-10-26 - Retreat Talk - Sacred Fertilizer - The Portal of Fear
description: 2014-10-26 - Retreat Talk - Sacred fertilizer - The Portal of Fear - Bringing presence to the contraction of fear is a universal part of spiritual awakening. This talk explores two interrelated pathways of opening to and transforming fear.
